MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:24am. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Clouden Road West substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:42am on 18th February 2021
